content: 12 tail draw through remaining stitches use this yarn to seam down to the band use the tail from cast on to seam up from the bottom of the band weave in the ends celebrate check your stash for yarn to make another in the round finish body divide stitches onto double point or circular needles placing a marker at the center back join and knit every row until the body measures 6 6 5 7 7 5 inches from the bottom of the earflap this will fit closely to the head for a slouchier hat add more row crown set up row knit 10 11 12 13 sts place marker repeat ending with the center back marker knit to marker slip marker k2tog repeat to the end of the row 7sts decreased knit the next row continue decreasing 7sts every other row until the stitch count is 35 35 42 42 decrease every row until 7 stitches remain break off yarn draw through remaining stitches use the tail from cast on to seam up from the bottom of the band weave in the ends celebrate check your stash for yarn to make another many many thanks and much credit to the award winning 1898 hat by kristine byrnes for the inspiration and techniques that her pattern provided https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/1898-hat
